p: A pyrimidine synthesis inhibitor such as NITD008 exhibited antiviral activity against ZIKV in vitro (EC 50 = 0.28–0.95 µM) and in A129 mice treated with 50 mg/kg/day of the drug. Also, 50% of NITD008-treated mice survived without developing any neurological signs [ 54]. However, due to toxic effects in pre-clinical evaluation, this drug was dismissed [ 55].
